explanation: [0-0] The video starts with a translucent plastic mold.

[0-3] Next, a cup of red liquid is poured into the mold. The scene changes to a red tray with six molds, each filled with two-thirds full of red liquid. Then, a hand uses a flat wooden stick to vertically insert it into the middle of the six molds one by one.
